website_summaries.verdict: This whimsical dragon makes an excellent buddy for imaginative children and fun-loving adults alike.
pros: This outstanding dragon features a fun, gender-neutral design
Buyers rave over the dragon's colorful body and shiny wings
cons: Product is a little darker than pictures show online

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product replaced!
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a gift for a nine year old girl. It was given to her on 3/17/18 one week later the stitching has started to separate and the beads are coming out. She still loves it so we will try a replacement. *Update: A replacement was delivered on 3/26/18. All the seams appear to be intact. Hopefully this one will last. I must say that getting a replacement was fast and easy! Amazon is excellent when it comes to keeping a customer satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: WLee

customer_reviews.title: NOT Blue & Green as described
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a blue & green dragon toy for my 4 year old son, who specifically requested these colors, so as to match another dragon toy he has. I was bummed when it arrived and there is no blue whatsoever, it is more pink/purple. To add to my frustration, I'm not able to return the item due to the holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, not the size I wanted, and not returnable (even though Prime item)
customer_reviews.text: This was not the product I expected - I don’t buy many of these, and the different sizes online & in store are priced very, very differently. I had bought this, and the other dragons, to go with the Saffire dragon I had received, not realizing they were teeny tiny. However, they were not returnable (and it would be super nice to be alerted to that *before* purchase). I was in a Walgreens today - not known for their cheap prices - and they had this exact item for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P

customer_reviews.title: 6 Year Old Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son got this for Christmas and he is loving it. My daughter got the pink one and they are having fun playing with them together. The size is nice because it isn't as large as the big Beanie Boos so he can hold it in his hand when he's falling asleep. In can also fit in a pocket really well.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: We love Beanie Boos in our house
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old was jealous of my 10 year old's Beanie Boo collection. He had seen this one and asked if it was a dinosaur beanie boo. Of course, it isn't. It really is a little dragon. However, to him it is close enough. He was THRILLED to get it on Christmas morning! We love Beanie Boos in our house, and I love that this one is more unisex so that little boys are drawn to it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does this count as an all-time classic? I just really like it, okay?
customer_reviews.text: Let's get some things out of the way: Beanie Boos are an acquired taste, moreso if you were around since the original Ty Beanie Baby days. But these guys really grew on me, and I am all for more dragon boos. Because dragons are awesome. Cinder is the first of the Beanie Boo dragons, and a lot of the design choices here have since carried over to later variants. The colors pop, the sparkles are just right, and-- who am I kidding, I'm just a sucker for dragons.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: How can you not like a little Ty toy? They little guys are so cute. The colors are great and they're really well made. They have names and birthdays too. Great gift for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Lovable
customer_reviews.text: We have the brother Sapphire. And my preschooler really loved it so we decided to get the Brother Cinder for the little brother. He carries it everywhere and already sleeps with him.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I just love this toy
customer_reviews.text: I just love this toy. Bought the blue for a 2 year old grandson. Bought myself the. Same thing-Cinder- with fushia wings in an airport. The thing is just crazy cute.
customer_reviews.author: giantconebill

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 4 year old. She saw one in a store and it was hard to separate her from it. Santa got it for her and now he's the favored. Nice quality. Thick stuffing.
customer_reviews.author: Jess P.

customer_reviews.title: good addition to a stuffed animal collection
customer_reviews.text: The hard eyes contraindicate buying this for a baby, but the sparkly material has withstood my toddler's vice-like grip and the material stands up well. The dragon is cute and loved in our home.
customer_reviews.author: W Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Dudley Jr.
customer_reviews.text: So cute. So green. So sparky an shiny! I got this dragon for my dragon obsessed daughter for her 1st grade graduation present, because when she was two, her auntie got her the Melissa and Doug huge green dragon and this little guy looks like they could be related. Sure enough, he was a big hit and was even dubbed Dudley Jr. (The big dragon's name is Dudley)
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Maree

customer_reviews.title: Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong stuffed toy. I got a pink cat when I ordered the green dragon.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: It came early and is just what I wanted the colors are slightly different but I like the colors I got even more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my collection!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little dragon. Amazing colors and super adorable. Great addition to my collection!
customer_reviews.author: TamesWildHorses

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: Not very soft. Odd odor but cute and bigger than expected
customer_reviews.author: Jane A. Tumminelli

customer_reviews.title: Great size for children's hands
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for gift to go along with dino book or toy. This fun color was not available in my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves dragons and was tickled to receive this in the mail. Quick shipping, great price, as described!
customer_reviews.author: Meg C

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Cinder!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures of this little Ty Beanie Boo doesn't do it any justice whatsoever. I was really impressed with the color details. It is a BEAUTIFUL color shifting green and purple and yellow. It is well made and the eyes are adorable. I ordered it as a gift for a friend who is a Dragon collector and I just know she will be thrilled with little Cinder.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria W.

customer_reviews.title: Love!! So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son! He looooved it!!! So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is well made and true to size and looks like the photo
customer_reviews.text: This Beanie Boos has help up very well. It is well made and true to size and looks like the photo. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: green dragon
customer_reviews.text: For a birthday present. I don't know if he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It took a long time to get this present for my nephew. It did not show up on time and so we had missed the occasion we bought it for. Was not happy with the response from their customer care. However we did finally get it. My nephew loves it and it has stood up very well. Besides the not coming on time great item.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: As usual, this beanie boo is absolutely adorable, and my daughter adores it. The item arrived in a timely manner and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: MSBrownEyedGirl

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Purple sparkles are very pretty. A must for dragon lovers
customer_reviews.author: princess9746

customer_reviews.title: Green and PINK (not blue)
customer_reviews.text: Item not as described. Definitely green and PINK so if you have a boy who loves green and blue DO NOT BUY this.

customer_reviews.title: grandson loves it

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Mother's day gift for the "Mother of Dragons"
customer_reviews.text: Exactly per photo and description -- sparkly green and purple fabric, purple glittery clear plastic eyes, cute details. Could not beat the price any where else.

customer_reviews.title: Love it but mich cheaper elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Cute little guy I got for my daughter because he looks like Nazboo from Shimmer and Shine
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and arrived on time. Cute little guy I got for my daughter because he looks like Nazboo from Shimmer and Shine. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: NOZAMATON

customer_reviews.title: I refuse to grow up
customer_reviews.text: Ty dragons are just too cute. I collected all the beanie babies when the craze first started, and have actually gotten rid of most of them but these dragons I just can't pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Dragons are cute
customer_reviews.text: adorable, had to have something for a cute little boy who was loving the beanie boos, this was perfect, his favorite color and close enough to a dinosaur, the little dragon will be a hit I am sure

customer_reviews.text: So cute! I bought this to add to my twin granddaughters big eye beanies!

customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This dragon is not green and blue as clearly shown and advertised. It is green and purple and not eligible for return! What a disappointment and shame on amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Cute!

customer_reviews.title: How can you go wrong with beenie boos? We ...
customer_reviews.text: How can you go wrong with beenie boos? We saw this dragon in a Michaels and my daughter wanted it, but I really wanted her to learn to wait on things and not expect to get everything she asks for in the store. a few weeks later ordered it for her winter holiday gift and she absolutely loves it. Very cute.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Produc
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and there is a small hole in the tail & the beads are falling out.

customer_reviews.title: This little dragon is cute and was the perfect size for my friend's one year old little girl
customer_reviews.text: This little dragon is cute and was the perfect size for my friend's one year old little girl. I like that this is a girl dragon and the rainbow colors of her "scales". It's small enough for little hands to grab. The dragon is well stuffed which I hope means it will not go flat too soon with continued play.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Cinder
customer_reviews.text: They really need more mythical Beanie Boos. My kids absolutely love Beanie Boos. The eyes are just irresistible. Cinder has an iridescent scale pattern on his body with shiny shimmery purple accents. He is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jane

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, great colors
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and as described, my son had this dragon in a different color and I bought this one for his dragon to have a "brother", he loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Cinder Fella

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality addition to my 2yr old son's collection. He loves dinosaurs, dragons, and any creature that says ROAR! The pictures do not do it justice. It gleams!

customer_reviews.title: Very shiny
customer_reviews.text: Very shiny and colorful, it was a hit with the granddaughter.

customer_reviews.title: They made the perfect little gift for my daughter's friends at her daycare

customer_reviews.text: little beads kept falling out of the stuffing, and are all over our house... and right out of the box too! Aside from that, this dragon is supposed to be the boy version, but the colors and decoration are not boyish at all. the pink one is less girly than this one.

product_meta.title: Ty Beanie Boos Cinder The Green Dragon Plush
product_meta.description: Color:GreenBeanie Boos are 6". They are made from Ty's best selling fabric - Ty Silk, and are created with fantastic custom eyes. Peek-a-Boo they want to come home with you.
feature_bullets: Look for the familiar heart-shaped tag that means you've purchased an authentic Ty product
Handmade with the finest quality standards in the industry
High quality for a low price!
